description.en:
*A spin-off of the YuruYuri series featuring the Oomuro family of sisters!*

From oldest to youngest, there's **Nadeshiko**, the cool and serious high schooler; **Sakurako**, the silly, lazy, and (slightly) dimwitted middle schooler; and **Hanako**, the intelligent and mature elementary schooler! 

This story focuses on these three sisters, their friends. and the many fun and wild adventures they have together!
description.ja: 優秀な長女・撫子、残念な次女・櫻子、優秀な三女・花子からなる大室家３姉妹。自由奔放な櫻子を中心に今日も大室さん家は賑やかです♪

altTitles.ja: 今日から始める幼なじみ

altTitles.zh-hk: 從今天開始的青梅竹馬

altTitles.zh: 从今天开始的青梅竹马

altTitles.vi: Bạn từ nhỏ kể từ ngày hôm nay

description.en:
Kaede Yuzuki is Kouhei Aida's new neighbor, both at home and in the classroom. Kouhei tries to be friendly with Kaede, but their conversations lead nowhere. But then one day…
___
[Official X Account](https://twitter.com/kyo_osa0420)
description.es-la: Kaede Yuzuki siempre deseó tener un amigo de la infancia como en los mangas que lee. Cuando se mudó al lado de su compañero de clase, Kouhei Aida, él dijo que haría cualquier cosa para ayudarla. Entonces, ¡ella le pidió que fuera su amigo de la infancia! ¡Los dos tienen divertidas aventuras recreando todas las cosas que deberían hacer los amigos de la infancia!

description.en:
All that matters to 15-year-old Nobara Sumiyoshi is volleyball–she's an awesome player with big-time ambitions. But sometimes it seems like a girl just can't get a break in the competitive world of high school volleyball.  
Nobara's family wants her to inherit the role of "young mistress," serving rich patrons at her family's old-fashioned Japanese restaurant. No thanks! When Nobara transfers to Crimson Field High School, known for its top-notch volleyball team, it turns out that her mother will stoop to dirty tricks to keep her off the court. With assistance from her feisty Aunt Momoko, who's got some connections at Crimson Field, Nobara decides to start playing offense.

title.en: A Woman Who Is Too Honest Despite Her Kyoto Dialect

altTitles.ja: 京都弁なのに正直すぎる女

altTitles.ja-ro: Kyoto-ben na no ni Shoujiki Sugiru Onna

altTitles.vi: Cô gái ấy quá trung thực mặc cho giọng thổ ngữ Kyoto của mình

altTitles.en: A Girl Who Is Too Honest Despite Her Kyoto Dialect

altTitles.es-la: Una chica demasiado honesta a pesar de su dialecto de Kyoto

altTitles.fr: Trop honnête pour quelqu’un qui parle Kyoto !

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。
description.es-la:
"En este reino, criaturas mitológicas deambulan, descendientes de los nueve cielos que llaman hogar."
Sibuxiang, un hombre-ciervo mitológico y perezoso, es expulsado del cielo y asignado a apoyar a las criaturas mitológicas que vagan por el mundo humano. Conoce y vive aventuras con sus amigos: el enérgico Pixiu amante de la comida llamado Pipi, el fanático conejo lunar Tony, los hermanos ratones Jinjiao y Yinjiao, también desterrados del cielo, y muchos otros. ¿Qué tipo de aventuras emprenderán?

altTitles.th: 2.5 มิติ ริริสะ

description.en:
From Seven Seas:
“I have no interest in real girls!” So claims Okumura, the president of the school’s manga club. He’s your typical otaku, obsessed with a sexy (fictional) 2D manga character known as Liliel. Then the new school year starts, and a (real!) 3D girl named Lilysa whose passion is cosplay joins the club. Lilysa convinces Okumura to become her photographer–and guess who her favorite manga character is? Not only that, but Lilysa is into modeling the fetishy stuff, The boundaries between 2D and 3D start to blur as this hot-blooded romantic comedy unfolds.

English volumes by [Seven Seas Entertainment](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/2-5-dimensional-seduction/)
description.ja: 現実の女に興味無し！俺の嫁・リリエルは2次元にあり！そんな漫研部長・奥村の前に現れたのは…リアルなリリエル？ドキドキコスプレコメディ開幕！
description.pt:
"Eu não estou interessado em uma mulher real! Minha waifu Liliel está no mundo 2D!" Okumura, presidente do clube de mangá, um dia na sua frente apareceu… uma Liliel real?  
Uma super comédia empolgante começa!
description.pt-br: "Eu não estou interessado em uma mulher real! Minha waifu, Liriel está no mundo 2D!" Okumura, presidente do clube de mangá, um dia na sua frente apareceu... uma Liriel real? Uma super comédia empolgante começa!

description.en: Yuushi Kamome is a freelance writer who lost his beloved daughter in an accident. In despair, his wife leaves him, and he spends his days like a shell of a man. One day, however, a flyer from a strange religious group, the "Heart Laughing Society," changes his fate. It shows the image of his wife, whom he has lost touch with...This is a story of faith and madness. What is the black darkness of the cult that an evil smile invites? A chilling “new religion” suspense begins!
description.ru:
Томодзи Камомэ — писатель-фрилансер, потерявший любимую дочь в результате несчастного случая. В отчаянии от него уходит жена, и он проводит свои дни в одиночестве, закрывшись от внешнего мира.
Однако однажды листовка странной религиозной группы «Общество смеющегося сердца» меняет его судьбу. В ней он увидел свою жену, с которой потерял связь...
description.vi: Yuji Kamome, một nhà báo tự do đã mất đi đứa con gái yêu quý của mình trong một vụ tai nạn. Trong cơn tuyệt vọng, vợ anh cũng đã rời bỏ anh, để mặc anh trải qua những tháng ngày trống rỗng. Tuy nhiên, một ngày nọ, một tờ rơi từ một giáo phái kỳ lạ mang tên "Tâm Tiếu Hội" tìm đến và thay đổi số phận của anh. Và trong bức ảnh trên tờ rơi đó anh đã nhận ra được người vợ đã biệt tăm biệt tích suốt thời gian qua của mình. Một câu chuyện về sự cuồng tín và điên rồ của con người. Thứ bóng tối tà đạo mà nụ cười ma quái đó đang mời gọi là gì?

altTitles.ja: ヤクザにお風呂で働かされてます。

altTitles.en: The Yakuza are Making Me Work at a Bathhouse.

description.en:
Miyako Yamazumei, who grew up in a single-parent household, returns to her hometown for the first time in 10 years after the death of her father. Her father left Miyako with the public bathhouse that he cherished, and a debt of 10 million yen that he owed to the yakuza. Miyako and the yakuza money-lender are determined to rebuild the bathhouse to make it profitable again.

(Source: Natalie.mu, translated)
description.ja: 父が遺した１千万円の借金をなぜか私を溺愛するヤクザ・蛇塚と共に返すことになり…！？「俺が優しくするんは みや子さんだけです――」年下ヤクザの執着愛にビビりながら今日も小梅湯、開店です…！！

title.en: Tying the Knot with an Amagami Sister

altTitles.fr: Se Marier avec une Sœur Amagami
Comment j'ai Marié une Sœur Amagami

altTitles.es-la: El Emparejamiento de la Familia Amagami

description.en: Kamihate Uryuu, orphaned since childhood, receives an invitation to stay at the local Shinto shrine. All he wanted was a quiet place to study so that he can fulfill his dream of making it into a top medical school, but after arriving there, he comes across three beautiful shrine maiden sisters... and the head priest requests that he marry one of them and take over the shrine.
description.fr: Kamihate Uryuu, orphelin depuis l'enfance, reçoit une invitation à séjourner dans le sanctuaire shinto local. Tout ce qu'il voulait, c'était un endroit tranquille pour étudier afin de réaliser son rêve d'entrer dans une grande école de médecine, mais en arrivant sur place, il tombe sur trois belles demoiselles du sanctuaire... Le prêtre en chef lui demande d'épouser l'une d'entre elles et de prendre la succession du sanctuaire. Une histoire d'amour et de miracles est sur le point de se dérouler !
description.ja: 京大医学部を目指す高校生の上終 瓜生。児童養護施設育ちの瓜生は「甘神神社」の宮司さんに引き取られ、居候することに。受験勉強ができる環境があれば…と思っていたが、居候の条件は「婿養子として神社を継ぐ」こと!? しかも結婚相手は同居する巫女三姉妹!! 一つ屋根の下、巫女と紡ぐ恋と奇跡の物語、開幕!!
description.ru: Камихатэ Урю долгое время прожил в приюте, пока не был взят под опеку священником Тидори Амагами. Остановившись в храме, Урю узнаёт, что здесь живут три жрицы-сёстры, которые являются внучками главного священника. В конечном итоге, Тидори Амагами рассказывает, что взял парня под опеку, чтобы он женился на одной из его внучек и унаследовал храм, как его зять. Так начинается история любви и чудес с семьёй Амагами.
description.vi:
Được thực hiện bởi phụ tá của Negi Haruba và được chính tác giả của Gotou-bun khuyến khích xem thử. Từ Oneshot nay đã có series và được đông đảo mọi người đón nhận
Uryuu Kamihate chuyển đến Kyoto và tình cờ sống chung với 3 chị em Miko trong một ngôi đền. Tuy vậy cậu lại là một người không tin vào thần linh mà chỉ tin tưởng bản thân mình, chuyện gì sẽ xảy đến với Uryuu khi xung quanh cậu là 3 chị em vu nữ xinh đẹp đây?
description.es-la: Un chico que había perdido la fe en las Oraciones y los Dioses, de pronto conocerá a 3 hermosas Hermanas que son Doncellas del Templo donde comenzará a vivir, ¿Esto afectará de alguna Manera a nuestro Protagonista? Léelo para descubrirlo.
description.pt-br: Kamihate Uryuu, órfão desde a infância, recebe um convite para ficar no santuário xintoísta local. Tudo o que ele queria era um lugar tranquilo para estudar, para que pudesse realizar seu sonho de entrar para uma faculdade de medicina de ponta, mas depois de chegar lá, ele se depara com três belas irmãs donzelas do santuário... E o sacerdote chefe pede que ele se case com uma delas e assuma o santuário. Uma história de amor e milagres está prestes a se desenrolar!

title.en: Asobinin wa Kenja ni Tenshoku Dekiru tte Shittemashita? ~ Yuusha Party o Tsuihou Sareta Lv 99

altTitles.es: ¿Sabías que un donjuán puede cambiar su trabajo por el de un sabio? El bufón del nivel 99 expulsado de la party de los héroes, se convertirá en un "gran sabio".

altTitles.en: Did You Know That a Playboy Can Change His Job to a Sage? ~The Level 99 Jester Expelled from the Heroes' Party Will Become a 'Great Sage'~

altTitles.ru: Знаете ли вы, что бездельник может стать мудрецом? — Шут 99-го уровня, исключенный из отряда героев, достиг звания «Великого мудреца»

altTitles.ja: 遊び人は賢者に転職できるって知ってました？　～勇者パーティを追放されたLV99道化師、【大賢者】になる～

altTitles.ko: 광대는 현자로 전직할 수 있다는 걸 알고 계셨나요?

altTitles.zh: 知道遊人可以轉職成賢者嗎？ ～被勇者隊伍放逐的LV99道化師將會成為【大賢者 】～

description.en:
The Jester ―― More commonly known as the ‘Playboy’ Dylan, was fired from the party of the Heroes. The self-centred Heroes didn’t understand Dylan’s importance to the group.  
  
They were just a group of one-man teams. Not interested in cooperation at all. Any failures are blamed on the jester. Dylan, who was disgusted with such companions and was sick of playing as their comedic foil, happily accepted being kicked out.  
  
The Heroes didn’t know. After saving them many times over with his magic tricks, the level 99 jester can change his job title to that of a ‘Great Sage’.  
  
“Life, how about a rewrite?”  
  
He’s done being the clown. From here on out, he’s going to take the leading role.

altTitles.th: เบอร์เซิร์ก

description.en:
Guts, known as the Black Swordsman, seeks sanctuary from the demonic forces attracted to him and his woman because of a demonic mark on their necks, and also vengeance against the man who branded him as an unholy sacrifice.

Aided only by his titanic strength gained from a harsh childhood lived with mercenaries, a gigantic sword, and an iron prosthetic left hand, Guts must struggle against his bleak destiny, all the while fighting with a rage that might strip him of his humanity.  
  
***Won the 6th Osamu Tezuka Cultural Prize Excellence Award in 2002.***

---

Note: Following Miura Kenta's death in 2021, the series has been taken over by Kouji Mori, who supervises the series with art done by Studio Gaga.
description.es: Guts, conocido como el Espadachín Negro, busca refugio de las fuerzas demoníacas que se sienten atraídas por él y su mujer debido a una marca demoníaca en el cuello, además de vengarse del hombre que lo marcó como un sacrificio impío. Únicamente con la ayuda de su fuerza titánica, adquirida tras una dura infancia vivida con mercenarios, una espada gigantesca y una prótesis de hierro en la mano izquierda, Guts deberá luchar contra su sombrío destino, al tiempo que combate con una rabia que podría despojarle de su humanidad.
description.ru: Гатс – Черный Мечник, за которым охотятся демоны. Мечник стремится найти все убежища демонов и отомстить человеку, сделавшего их него «жертвенную овечку». Черный Мечник противостоит жестокой судьбе благодаря непоколебимой воле, невероятной силе, и, конечно же, меча. Постоянные сражения со злом приближает Гатса к параллельному миру тьмы, лишая его человечности. Берсерк – сложная, но сильная история о сражениях и злой судьбе.
description.th:
เบอร์เซิร์ก เป็นชื่อมังงะ แนวดาร์ค แฟนตาซี ของญี่ปุ่น วาดโดยเคนทาโร่ มิอุระ มีการดำเนินเรื่องเกิดขึ้นในยุคกลางของยุโรป โดยได้รับอิทธิพลมาจากโลกแห่งจินตนิมิตด้านมืด มีตัวละครเอกของเรื่องคือ กัทส์ ทหารรับจ้างผู้โดดเดี่ยวและ กริฟฟิท หัวหน้าของกลุ่มทหารรับจ้างที่รวมตัวกันภายใต้ชื่อ กองพันเหยี่ยว

----
 [Shopee (ไทย)](https://shopee.co.th/berserk%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%8C%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%8B%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%81-%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%B4%E0%B9%8A%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%84-%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%A1-1-20-%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%A1%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B7%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B6%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%87-i.63434898.1855330863)
description.tr:
Kara Kılıç Ustası olarak anılan Guts, vücutlarındaki şeytani damga yüzünden onlara musallat olan şeytani güçlerden, kadınını ve kendisini korumanın bir yolunu aramaktadır. Aynı zamanda onu damgalayan ve bir kurban konumuna düşüren adamdan intikam almaya çalışmaktadır. Paralı askerlerle geçirdiği zorlu çocukluk yıllarının getirdiği tecrübeler sayesinde elde ettiği büyük gücü, devasa bir kılıç ve protez bir kol ile destekleyen Guts, karamsar kaderiyle mücadele etmek zorundadır. Tüm bunları yaparken, insani benliğini kaybetmesine neden olabilecek öfkeyle başa çıkmalıdır. 

TheWildDeer'dan Dorylaion tarafından biraz yorum katılarak sitedeki ingilizce açıklamadan çevrilmiştir.
description.uk: Його ім'я Ґатс, Чорний Мечник. Він могутній воїн, про якого говорять лишень пошепки. У нього є велетенський меч , рука зі заліза й шрами від незліченних боїв і тортур. А ще його плоть позначена Тавром — нечестивим символом, який притягує сили пітьми й робить Ґатса їхньою жертвою. Але Ґатс не прийме таку долю спокійно: він порубає на фарш війська проклятих, як і будь-кого, кому стане дурості стати на його шляху! Ґатс іде в товаристві ельфа Пака (більше докучайла, ніж товариша) темним і закривавленим шляхом, який приведе лише до загибелі... Чи помсти.
description.es-la: Guts, conocido como el Espadachín Negro, busca refugio de las fuerzas demoníacas que se sienten atraídas por él y su mujer debido a una marca demoníaca en el cuello, además de vengarse del hombre que lo marcó como un sacrificio impío. Únicamente con la ayuda de su fuerza titánica, adquirida tras una dura infancia vivida con mercenarios, una espada gigantesca y una prótesis de hierro en la mano izquierda, Guts deberá luchar contra su sombrío destino, al tiempo que combate con una rabia que podría despojarle de su humanidad.
description.pt-br: Guts, conhecido como o Espadachim Negro, busca refúgio das forças demoníacas atraídas por ele e sua mulher por causa de uma marca demoníaca em seus pescoços, e também vingança contra o homem que o marcou como um sacrifício profano.  Ajudado apenas por sua força titânica adquirida de uma infância dura vivida com mercenários, uma espada gigantesca e uma mão esquerda protética de ferro, Guts deve lutar contra seu destino sombrio, enquanto luta com uma raiva que pode despojá-lo de sua humanidade.

description.en: One day, Liu Hai happened upon a dilapidated magic book. When she imitated the wizard in the magic book to create a magic circle, she accidentally summoned a monster girl named Chi Liu. Chi Liu is the source of strength in the country of Chi. She had been imprisoned for a long time and finally managed to escape. While Liu Hai in the human world was experimenting with the magic circle, the two met...

title.en: Shokuba no Onnanoko ni Toushisuru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 職場の女の子に投資する話

altTitles.en: A Story About Investing in a Girl at the Workplace

altTitles.pt-br: Uma história sobre investir em uma garota no local de trabalho

description.en:
Hatamoto Ikuto, the manager of the local bookstore "BOOK FOREST", is an otaku who can't resist spending money on his favorite characters in games.
Todoroki Miran, the part-time leader, looks up to him but can't understand his obsession with spending on in-game things.
When Ikuto claims, "For me, spending money is an investment", Miran teases, "If that's the case, how about you invest in me...?"
As the two navigate a cycle of investment and returns, the distance between their hearts begins to shrink.
A unique and charming investment-themed romantic comedy!

(Source: Melonbooks, edited)
description.ja: 街の書店「BOOK FOREST」で店長を務める畑本育人は、ゲームの「推し」キャラに課金してしまうオタク気質。バイトリーダーの轟ミランは、店長に憧れるものの、データに課金することだけは理解できない。「オレにとって課金は投資だ」と話す育人に、「それならあたしにも投資…して?」と話すミランだが…。投資と還元を繰り返し、2人の心の距離が揺れ動く――新感覚の投資ラブコメ！
description.pt-br:
Hatamoto Ikuto, gerente da livraria local “BOOK FOREST”, é um otaku que não resiste a gastar dinheiro com seus personagens favoritos dos jogos.
Todoroki Miran, líder de meio período, o admira, mas não consegue entender sua obsessão por gastar em coisas de jogos.
Quando Ikuto afirma: “Para mim, gastar dinheiro é um investimento”, Miran provoca: “Se é assim, que tal você investir em mim...?”
Enquanto os dois navegam em um ciclo de investimentos e retornos, a distância entre seus corações começa a diminuir.
Uma comédia romântica única e encantadora com tema de investimento!

title.en: My New Girlfriend Is Not Human?

altTitles.de: Meine neue Freundin ist kein Mensch?

altTitles.fr: Ma Nouvelle Copine N'est Pas Humaine ?

altTitles.pt-br: Minha nova namorada não é humana?

altTitles.tr: Yeni kız arkadaşım insan değil mi?

altTitles.pl: Moja nowa dziewczyna nie jest człowiekiem?

description.en: Yuuma and Rin are childhood friends that are joined at the hip. However, they're mutually expecting a little something or another to nudge their relationship a little closer... not that they'll ever admit it, mind you!
description.pt-br: Yuuma e Rin são amigos de infância bastante unidos. No entanto, eles esperam mutuamente que uma coisinha ou outra aconteça para que aproxime um pouco mais seu relacionamento... não que eles admitam isso!

altTitles.ja: ちゃんと吸えない吸血鬼ちゃん

description.en: The overwhelming preciousness that captivates all those whose blood she sucks!
description.ja:
クラスメイトの石川月菜は吸血鬼。クールでミステリアスな彼女はクラスの人気者！だけど、実は血を吸うのがメッチャ下手！？

クラスのモブ的存在・大鳥くんはひょんなことからそんな吸血鬼ちゃんの練習相手になることに…！
description.pt-br: A preciosidade esmagadora que cativa todos aqueles cujo sangue ela suga! Um novo tipo de comédia de mimos e alimentação!

description.en: What should I do to become an adult? Akane Amou, who grew up with her parents forbidding any kind of entertainment, is a little bad with "stimulating" stuff, to the point she can't even watch a kissing scene in a drama. Now that she's a highschool student, she somehow wants to overcome it! Those are her intentions, but it's not that easy. Meanwhile, she got acquainted with a movie otaku named Fuyumine. Will she be able to watch an R15 movie...?
description.ja:
大人になるって、どうすればいいの？　親からすべての娯楽を禁止されて育った天羽秋音は、ドラマのキスシーンも観れないくらい、”刺激的”なものが少し苦手。高校生にもなったんだから、なんとか克服したい！　と意気込むが、なかなか道は険しい。そんな中、映画オタクの冬峰と知り合い、15禁映画を観ることになり…⁉
 
--- 
 
Otona ni naru tte, dōsureba ī no? Oya kara subete no goraku o kinshi sa rete sodatta Amou aki-on wa, dorama no kisushīn mo mi renai kurai, ”shigeki-teki” na mono ga sukoshi nigate. Kōkōsei ni mo natta ndakara, nantoka kokufuku shitai! To ikigomu ga, nakanaka michi wa kewashī. Son'na Chū, eiga otaku no fuyu-hō to shiriai, 15 kin eiga o miru koto ni nari...!?
description.vi:
"Mình sẽ làm gì để trở thành người lớn?"
Akane Amo, lớn lên trong sự bảo bọc nghiêm khắc của cha mẹ mà không tiếp xúc với phương tiện giải trí, bước qua tuổi 15, trước những thứ "tình cảm", thậm chí là một nụ hôn cũng không thể xem được.
Giờ đã vào trường cấp ba, cùng với cậu bạn Fuyumine, Amo sẽ bước qua những rào cản ấy. Liệu cô bé có thể xem được một phim nhán mác "cấm trẻ em"?
description.pt-br:
O que devo fazer para me tornar uma adulta?

Akane Amou, que cresceu com seus pais proibindo qualquer tipo de entretenimento, é um pouco ruim com coisas "estimulantes", até o ponto de não conseguir assistir a uma cena de beijo em um drama. Agora que ela é estudante do ensino médio, ela quer de alguma forma superá-lo! Essas são suas intenções, mas não é tão fácil. Enquanto isso, ela se familiarizou com um filme otaku chamado Fuyumine. Será que ela será capaz de assistir um filme R15...?

description.en:
With her fierce eyes and sharp impression, and wary of everyone, 'Ahn Se-young' is a woman to watch out for.
Everyone is cautious around her, but a lone boy stands in front of her.
"I like you, go out with me!"
"......What?!"
Se-young is taken aback at the sudden confession of love, but this was just the beginning...
The tug-of-war between 'Ahn Se-young', who shows an unexpected side to her as you get closer, and 'Nam Ho-yeol', the straightforward guy who tries to break down her impenetrable facade, begins now!
description.ko:
사나운 눈매와 날카로운 인상으로 주변 사람들에게 경계를 받고 있는 요주의 그녀 '안세영'.
모두가 경계심을 놓지 못할 때 그녀의 앞에 한 남자애가 마주선다.
"나 너 좋아해, 나랑 사귀자!"
"......뭐?!"
난데없는 사랑고백에 진땀이 빠지는 세영, 하지만 이건 시작에 불과했으니...
가까이 다가갈수록 반전의 모습을 보이는 그녀 '안세영'과
그 모습을 빈틈없이 파고 들려는 직진남 '남호열'의 줄다리기가 지금 시작된다!

title.en: It Turns out That I Have Been Invincible for a Long Time

altTitles.en: I've Been Invincible for a Long Time

altTitles.vi: Hoá Ra Ta Đã Vô Địch Từ Lâu

altTitles.ja: 才能ゼロが無敵になったわけ

description.en: Over a five-year journey around the world, Ye Changqing first believed he could be like other cool novel protagonist systems with a plug-in, but even the most common immortal cultivator cannot be. Living close to a sect in a small town was his only option, so he started a business. His small store eventually turned into the holy land of all the righteous individuals, and the dog he raised up turned out to be the feared demon king. From that moment on, everyone acknowledged Ye Changqing as a Supreme Master.

title.en: I Think I Have Transmigrated Somewhere

altTitles.ko: 제가 어딘가 빙의를 한 것 같은데요.

altTitles.en: I Have Possessed the Body of the Protagonist
I Think I've Been Possessed Somewhere

altTitles.es-la: Creo que he transmigrado en alguna novela

description.en:
Even though the harsh reality feels like living as a beggar, to think that the end would be death from overworking!
If it’s going to end like this, I should’ve been in a lot of relationships, but wait,
oh my... who are you in the mirror?

I’m a little flustered but this body… it’s really pretty!
It feels like I’ve been transmigrated into a romance fantasy novel.
Since I’m already like this, should I enjoy the romance while I’m at it?

“But which novel did I get transmigrated into?”

I’ve read dozens of books where the ‘Northern Duke’ and ‘Childhood Friends’ exist,
I’ve read so many with a black-haired male lead and a blonde female lead,
Ah~ I don’t know!! For now, let’s start by conquering the male characters!

“I already have a promised marriage."

“I volunteered for the Western Guard. We won’t be able to meet for several years.”
What is this, is this really a romance fantasy novel? Why is everyone running away?!
In the first place… was I really transmigrated as the female lead?

What kind of novel is this!!!!
<It Seems I’ve Transmigrated Somewhere>
description.pl:
Uwielbiam powieści romantyczno-fantastyczne, a nawet trafiłam do jednej z nich.
"W każdym razie, do której książki się przeniosłam?"
Myślę, że przeczytałam około 20 książek z brązowowłosymi pokojówkami z piegami,
Myślę, że przeczytałem około 20 książek z południową damą, która poślubia zimnego księcia z północy,
I wydaje się, że jest więcej książek z czarnowłosymi mężczyznami i blondynkami?
"Czekaj, czy to w ogóle prawda, że zmieniłam się w główną bohaterką?"
Nie, myślę, że to może nawet nie być romans fantasy?

altTitles.ja: 真夜中ハートチューン

altTitles.en: Tune In to the Midnight Heart

altTitles.pt-br: Sintonizando com o Coração da Meia Noite
Em busca da garota por trás da voz

description.en:
"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people?
___
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10568/episode/347385) (U.S. Only)
description.ja:
「深夜ひとり、ベッドの上、キミの声だけが救いだった。もう一度キミと話したい。言いたいことがあるんだ」。

高校2年生の山吹有栖は、「アポロ」という名の、顔も本名も知らないラジオ配信者の少女を探していた。だがある日、有栖は進学先の高校の放送部にアポロの手がかりを得る。そこにいたのは「声に関わる仕事に就く」夢を描く美少女が…4人!! アポロは誰？4人の夢の行方は？かわいくも懸命なサクセスラブコメ、ここに開演!!
description.ru:
«Пока я лежал на кровати посреди ночи в полном одиночестве, твой голос был моим единственным утешением. Я хочу поговорить с тобой ещё раз. И должен кое-что тебе сказать».

Ямабуки Арису, ученик второго класса старшей школы, ищет бывшую ведущую радио-стримов «Аполло», не зная ни её лица, ни имени. Однако, однажды он понимает, что Аполло скрывается среди участниц клуба радиовещания в его школе. Четыре красавицы оттуда мечтают получить работу, связанную с голосом. Но которая из них — Аполло? И что станет с их мечтами? Милый ромком о тяжёлом труде и успехе начинается!
description.pt-br: Yamabuki Arisu, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, estava procurando por uma garota chamada “Apollo”, que era locutora de rádio e ele não conhecia seu rosto ou seu nome verdadeiro. No entanto, um dia, Arisu recebe uma pista sobre Apollo do clube de transmissão da escola secundária para a qual ela estava indo. Havia quatro belas garotas que sonhavam em “conseguir um emprego relacionado à voz”!! Quem é Apollo? O que acontecerá com os sonhos dessas quatro pessoas? Uma comédia romântica fofa, mas trabalhadora e de sucesso, começa aqui!!

title.en: Watashi o Aisuru Sannin no Danna-sama

altTitles.ja: 私を愛する3人の旦那さま

altTitles.en: My Three Husbands Who Love Me

description.en: Rio Yamabuki died saving a cat. When she wakes up, she finds herself 15 years in the past, on the day her husband proposed to her. She believed that marrying him would bring her happiness. However, the reality was a disastrous marriage filled with her husband's abuse, caring for his parents, and ultimately being killed by her husband and his lover for insurance money. A grim reaper appears and tells her, "Redo your marriage as you wish." If she can redo her life from rock bottom, this time she will live for herself and seize happiness!! Just when she thought that, three high-spec men claiming to be her husband appear...!?
description.ja:
猫を助けて死んでしまった山吹理央（やまぶきりお）。

目を覚ますと、そこは15年前に、旦那からプロポーズをされる日だった。

この人と結婚すれば幸せになれると信じていた。
しかし現実は、旦那のモラハラ、義家族の介護、仕舞いには保険金目当てに
旦那と不倫相手の親友に殺された散々な結婚。

そこへ死神が現れ、猫を助けた代わりに、「お前の望む結婚をやり直せ」と言う。

どん底人生をやり直せるなら、今度こそ自分のために生きて幸せをつかみ取る！！
・・・と思った矢先、理央の旦那だと名乗るハイスぺ男が「３人」も現れて・・・！？

altTitles.en: I'll Take Those You Play the Field With

altTitles.ru: Это клёвое место я беру на себя

altTitles.th: พระเอกในสต็อกเธอนั้น ฉันขอรับไว้เอง

altTitles.vi: Tôi sẽ chiếm lấy ngư trường!

altTitles.ja: 私のものになりなさい！

description.en: After being abused and killed by her family in two separate lifetimes, Blesse Lavian expects nothing from them in her third life. This time, despite knowing the horrible end that awaits House Lavian, Blesse decides to keep quiet and flee when the time is right. But the more time she spends with her cold-looking father and half-sister, the more she realizes that the Lavians aren't so bad after all. Will Blesse take a chance and rewrite her third life, or will she end up betrayed once again?
description.es: Después de mi primera vida como hija ilegítima de una familia adinerada y mi segunda vida como hija ilegítima de un líder de una secta demoníaca, en esta vida fui poseída como la hija ilegítima de una familia que estaba siendo exterminada en una novela…! Intento dejar atrás a la familia que está siendo destruida, pero es extraño que al padre ni siquiera le importara su hijo ilegítimo en el original. «Bliss, haría cualquier cosa por ti». Y la hermana mayor, la mujer malvada que destruirá a la familia en el futuro, comienza a aparecer. “Hola bebé, soy tu hermana…” ¡Sí! ¡Vivamos esta vida junto con nuestras familias! ¡Tan pronto como decidí hacer esto, los protagonistas masculinos que se suponía que estaban obsesionados con la protagonista femenina original comenzaron a obsesionarse conmigo…! ¿Mi tercera vida estará bien así?
description.ru: В моей первой жизни я была внебрачным ребёнком чеболей. Во второй – ребёнком лидера секты боевых искусств. Теперь же стала незаконнорождённым дитя в семье, что по роману будет в прах уничтожена!  Планируя бросить семью, обречённую на погибель, начинают происходить странные вещи.   Папа, который в оригинальной истории никогда не заботился о ребёнке, вдруг проявляет интерес.  — Блесс, для тебя я сделаю, что угодно.  А также злая сестра, что в будущем разрушит нашу семью...  — Привет, малышка, я твоя сестра...  Хорошо! В этот раз я проживу вместе со своей семьёй! Но стоило мне принять это решение, как главные мужские персонажи становятся одержимы мной!  Всё ли будет нормально в моей третьей жизни?
description.vi:
Kiếp đầu tiên, tôi là Han Soyeon, đứa con ngoài giá thú của gia đình Chaebol. Kiếp thứ hai, tôu là đứa con hoang của gia đình lãnh đạo tôn giáo. Kiếp thứ ba… Tôi sở hữu cơ thể của đứa con ngoài giá thú của gia đình phản diện trong cuốn tiểu thuyết tôi đọc ở kiếp trước!
Kiếp thứ ba cũng là đứa con ngoài giá thú… Thật oan ức! Số phận này thật đáng ghét, kiếp này tôi sẽ sống theo ý mình.
Ở kiếp này, tôi cần ghi nhớ 3 điều.
1. Mặc kệ người cha không yêu thương con mình trong nguyên tác. Tôi cũng không yêu ông ấy!
2. Đừng vây quanh nam chính như một con chó điên luôn sủa quanh nữ chính!
3. Đừng dính líu đến chị gái phản diện là nguyên nhân khiến gia đình tan nát mà hãy bỏ trốn!

“Hihi, chào Bliss, chị là chị gái của em…”
…Nhưng chị ấy đáng yêu mà nhỉ? Đôi má mềm mại đó… Tôi không được can thiệp… Không được…
Được rồi, ít nhất không dính líu đến nam chính thì kiếp này sẽ không có gì xảy ra! Trước khi bỏ trốn khỏi những bất hạnh trong tương lai, tôi chỉ định tiếp xúc với chị gái phản diện một chút thôi. Thế mà… Những sự cố đối mặt với nam chính cứ liên tục diễn ra.
“Nhóc con, em đang làm gì vậy?”
Hoàng thái tử tương lai cao quý sao lại ở con hẻm phía sau?
“Cô thì biết cái gì!”
Cậu bé vô gia cư gây sự với tôi, vậy mà giờ lại bám dính như kẹo cao su ấy?
“Tôi sẽ sống vì em”
Tôi chỉ giúp anh tí thôi mà anh bảo hi sinh cả mạng sống thì hơi sợ à nha…
Kiếp thứ ba của tôi rõ ràng là một con đường vững chắc… Sao lại thành ra thế này?
description.pt-br: Na minha primeira vida, fui filha ilegítima de uma família chaebol. Na minha segunda vida, fui filha ilegítima de uma bruxa. Agora, nesta vida, reencarnei como filha ilegítima de uma família destinada à destruição em um romance! Planejando deixar para trás a família condenada, coisas estranhas começam a acontecer. Papai, que na história original nunca se importou com a filha ilegítima, está agindo de forma estranha. "Bliss, eu posso fazer qualquer coisa por você." E agora, a irmã vilã que vai arruinar a família no futuro chama minha atenção. "Olá, querida, sou sua irmã..." Tudo bem! Vamos morar com minha família nesta vida! Mas assim que tomo essa decisão, os protagonistas masculinos que deveriam estar com a heroína original começam a ficar obcecados por mim! Tudo bem com minha terceira vida?

description.en:
"Please... Kiss Me"

The young man, Yuusei Hakozaki, carries the memory of being kidnapped and confined along with six girls during his childhood. One day, as an adult leading a peaceful life, a girl suddenly appears before him and demands a kiss...!?

Yuusei is told of a single "rule": He must kiss the girls once every 24 hours. If he fails to do so, their heads will explode and they will die.

To save the girls from their deadly fate, Yuusei starts a communal life with them where he must "kiss them every day." In this closed-off miniature Eden, the story begins to unfold. Can Yuusei discern their lies and truths and find his one destined partner?
description.id: "Tolong ― Cium Aku"Hakozaki Yuuki, seorang pemuda yang dihantui kenangan tentang penculikan dan penyekapan bersama enam gadis sewaktu kecil, menjalani kehidupan tenang dan biasa sebagai orang dewasa. Namun, ketenangannya hancur ketika salah satu gadis tersebut tiba-tiba muncul di depannya dan memintanya untuk menciumnya!Yuuki dihadapkan pada satu aturan mengerikan:Dia harus mencium setiap gadis itu sekali dalam 24 jam.Jika dia gagal melakukannya, kepala mereka akan meledak, menyebabkan kematian mereka.Bertekad untuk menyelamatkan mereka dari nasib tragis ini, Yuuki memulai hidup bersama dengan para gadis tersebut, dengan misi "mencium mereka setiap hari." Di tengah kehidupan bersama dalam dunia yang tertutup ini, cerita mulai terungkap.Di balik kebohongan dan kebenaran para gadis, Yuuki harus memahami perasaan mereka yang sebenarnya dan mengungkap rahasia masa lalu mereka. Bisakah dia menemukan satu-satunya takdir sejatinya?
description.pt-br:
"Por favor... Beije-me"

O jovem Yuusei Hakozaki carrega a memória de ter sido sequestrado e mantido em cativeiro junto com seis garotas durante sua infância. Um dia, já adulto e levando uma vida pacífica, uma garota aparece repentinamente diante dele e exige um beijo...!?

Yuusei é informado de uma única "regra": ele deve beijar as garotas uma vez a cada 24 horas. Se falhar, suas cabeças explodirão e elas morrerão.

Para salvar as garotas desse destino mortal, Yuusei começa a viver com elas, onde precisa "beijá-las todos os dias". Nesse pequeno Éden fechado, a história começa a se desenrolar. Será que Yuusei conseguirá distinguir suas mentiras e verdades e encontrar sua única parceira predestinada?

description.en:
In lands far..far away, where scary monsters and horrific creatures live. where hidden treasures and magic exists, where there are still undiscovered kingdoms and empires mankind discovered a new source of energy to empower their mechanical machines & weapons. we discovered vanilla the source of unlimited energy. follow the journey of gen orchid, rosa & altamiras as they seek the djinn chef master to grant their wishes

story & art by me & my wife, together we are couple comics #fantasy_Manga_to_read

altTitles.de: Ich würde mir gerne eine Freundin ausleihen

altTitles.th: สะดุดรักยัยแฟนเช่า

altTitles.vi: Dịch Vụ Cho Thuê Bạn Gái

description.en:
Kinoshita Kazuya is a regular college student who was just dumped by his girlfriend for another guy. Feeling down in the dumps, he decides to use an app called Diamond to hire Mizuhara Chizuru, a rental girlfriend, to make himself feel better. From their first meeting, she seems to be the perfect girl for him, but is there more to her than meets the eye? And how will their not quite typical relationship develop?
___
**Additional Links:**
- Alt Official English: [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10001/episode/312699) - United States, Japan, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, & Singapore only.
- Official English Volumes: [Kodansha USA](https://kodansha.us/series/rent-a-girlfriend/)
description.fr: Kinoshita Kazuya est un étudiant régulier qui vient d'être largué par sa petite amie pour un autre gars. Se sentant dans les décharges, il décide d'utiliser une application appelée Diamond pour embaucher Mizuhara Chizuru, une petite amie de location, afin de se sentir mieux. Dès leur première rencontre, elle semble être la fille parfaite pour lui, mais est-ce qu'il y a autre chose pour elle que ce qui est à l'oeil? Et comment va se développer leur relation pas tout à fait typique?
description.it: Kinoshita Kazuya è un normale studente universitario che è stato appena lasciato dalla sua ragazza. Devastato, decide di usare un app chiamata "Diamond" per reclutare Mizuhara Chizuru, una ragazza a noleggio per tirargli su il morale. Fin dal loro primo incontro, sembra essere la ragazza perfetta per lui, ma ci sarà altro dietro a quell'immagine da "brava ragazza"…? E come si evolverà la loro inusuale relazione?
description.ja: 都内在住のダメダメ大学生、木ノ下和也（20）。ある日、“ワケアリ”の超絶美少女、水原千鶴との出会いをキッカケに、彼の人生は大きく変わり始めて──！？
description.pt: Kazuya Kinoshita é um estudante universitário inútil que decide utilizar uma aplicação de relacionamentos depois de ter levado terminado com a sua namorada. Assim, o rapaz conhece uma bela garota chamada Chizuru Mizuhara e a vida dos dois começa a mudar a partir daí. O que nos espera nesta incrível comédia romântica?!
description.ru: Двадцатилетний никудышный студент университета муниципального района Киносита Кадзуя. Встреча с «особенной» красавицей ознаменует начало изменений в его жизни?!
description.es-la: Kinoshita Kazuya es un estudiante universitario normal al que su novia acaba de dejar por otro chico. Sintiéndose deprimido, decide usar una aplicación llamada Diamond para contratar a Mizuhara Chizuru, una novia de alquiler, para sentirse mejor. Desde su primer encuentro con ella, parece ser la chica perfecta para él, pero ¿hay más en ella de lo que parece? ¿Y cómo se desarrollará su relación no muy típica?
description.pt-br: Kazuya Kinoshita é um estudante universitário inútil que decide utilizar um aplicativo de relacionamentos depois de ter levado um fora de sua namorada. Assim, o rapaz conhece uma bela garota chamada Chizuru Mizuhara e a vida dos dois começa a mudar a partir daí. O que nos espera nesta incrível comédia romântica?!

description.ar: روم-كوم عن صبي مدرسة ثانوية خجول ولطيف من مدرسة البيسبول يلتقي بطالبة منتقلة جديدة بمفردها. فيعلم عن تعرضها للاعتداء ولكن بطريقة ما تبدو هذه الفتاة غريبة نوعًا ما لأنها فجأةً طلبت منه المال لمساعدتها!
description.en: Hoshino, a member of the baseball club meets Yamada, a classmate who has just transferred to his new school. She cries loudly that she was "mugged" and makes a certain "request" to him. The world's funniest master-slave relationship between a clueless girl and a good-natured little guy is about to begin.

altTitles.th: BLUE LOCK ขังดวลแข้ง

description.de: Nach dem Aus im Achtelfinale bei der WM 2018 ruft der japanische Fußballverband ein Projekt ins Leben, das den ultimativen Stürmer erschaffen und Japan den Weltmeistertitel bringen soll: Blue Lock. Zu diesem Zweck werden die 300 talentiertesten Oberschüler versammelt, darunter auch Yoichi Isagi, ein unbeschriebenes Blatt. Kann er sich gegen die große Konkurrenz durchsetzen und Japans große Hoffnung werden?
description.en:
Yoichi Isagi lost the opportunity to go to the national high school championships because he passed to his teammate who missed instead of shooting himself. Isagi is one of 300 U-18 strikers chosen by Jinpachi Ego, a man who was hired by the Japan Football Association after the 2018 FIFA World Cup, to guide Japan to winning the World Cup by destroying Japanese football. Ego's plan is to isolate the 300 strikers into a prison-like institution called "Blue Lock", in order to create the world's biggest "egotist"/striker, which has been lacking in Japanese football.

---
**Notes:**
- **Won the 45th Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2021**

**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K Manga](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10008/episode/318774) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/blue-lock/)
description.fr:
Isagi Yoichi a perdu l'opportunité d'aller aux championnats nationaux des lycées parce qu'il a passé la balle à son coéquipier qui a raté son but. Isagi est l'un des 300 attaquants U-18 choisis par Ego Jinpachi, un homme qui a été embauché par la Fédération Japonaise de Football après la Coupe du Monde de la FIFA 2018, pour guider le Japon vers la victoire de la Coupe du Monde en détruisant le football japonais. Le plan d'Ego est d'isoler les 300 attaquants dans une institution semblable à une prison appelée "Blue Lock", afin de créer le plus grand "égoïste"/attaquant du monde, ce qui fait défaut dans le football japonais.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Pika**
description.pl:
Piłkarskie battle royale – tak można opisać całą tę historię.  
Z powodu niepowodzeń na mistrzostwach świata, Japoński Związek Piłki Nożnej postanawia wdrożyć program, dzięki któremu uda się stworzyć rewolucyjnego napastnika.  
Yoichi Isagi otrzymuje zaproszenie do wzięcia udziału w tym właśnie programie. Zamknięty w placówce o nazwie Blue Lock, będzie walczył z 299 innymi graczami i starał się zostać najlepszym napastnikiem na świecie.
description.vi: Blue Lock (ブルーロック Burū Rokku) hay Dự án bồi dưỡng cầu thủ đặc biệt là một dự án chuyên đào tạo những tiền đạo trẻ từ khắp nơi trên đất nước Nhật Bản, bao gồm 3 vòng tuyển chọn chính và các vòng phụ. Dự án này có sự tham gia của 300 tiền đạo trẻ và họ sẽ đối đầu trực tiếp với nhau trong các vòng đấu loại trực tiếp.
description.pt-br: Yoichi Isagi perdeu a oportunidade de ir para o campeonato nacional do ensino médio porque ele passou para seu companheiro de equipe que perdeu em vez de chutar para o gol si mesmo. Isagi é um dos 300 atacantes de Sub-18 escolhidos por Jinpachi Ego, contratado pela Associação de Futebol do Japão após a Copa do Mundo de 2018, para guiar o Japão na conquista da Copa do Mundo ao destruir o futebol japonês. O plano de Ego é isolar os 300 atacantes em uma instituição parecida com uma prisão chamada “Blue Lock”, para criar o maior “egoista” / atacante do mundo, que tem faltado no futebol japonês.

title.en: Dainana Maouji Jilbagias no Maou Keikokuki

altTitles.ja: 第七魔王子ジルバギアスの魔王傾国記

altTitles.en: Zilbagias the Demon Prince: How the Seventh Prince Brought Down the Kingdom
Seventh Demon Prince Jilbagias' Chronicle of Overthrowing the Demon Kingdom
7th Demon Prince Jilbagias, the Demon Kingdom Destroyer

description.en:
The hero Alexander and his comrades unleash a daring raid on the Demon King’s castle, intent on assassinating him and bringing an end to the war against the darkness in one fell swoop. However, the raid goes awry when his party is effortlessly decimated by the Demon King’s overwhelming power.

But death is not the end of the road for Alexander, as he is reincarnated two years later as that very same Demon King’s son. With the memories of his past life still intact, he vows to use his miraculous second chance to continue fighting—this time destroying the demonic kingdom from within as the Demon Prince Zilbagias.

It doesn’t take long for his mettle to be tested either, as passing as a young demon prince without blowing his cover proves to be quite a bit more challenging than he initially anticipated.

---

[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/zilbagias-the-demon-prince-how-the-seventh-prince-brought-down-the-kingdom)
description.fr: Alexandre, dont la ville natale a été détruite par la race démoniaque, s'est battu avec le Roi Démon et a été tué. Mais au lieu d'être accueilli dans l'au-delà, lorsqu'il ouvre les yeux, il renaît sous les traits du fils du roi des démons, Jilbagias ? Tout en cachant sa véritable identité, il se souille les mains d'atrocités en se conduisant comme le prince démon idéal, augmentant son pouvoir pour finalement renverser le royaume des démons...

title.en: During the Live Streaming, I Proposed to a Female Ghost - And She Actually Agreed?!

altTitles.zh: 直播整活，我向女鬼求婚——她居然真答应了？！

altTitles.zh-ro: Zhibo Zheng Huo, Wo Xiang Nv Gui Qiuhun - Ta Juran Zhen Dayingle?!

altTitles.en: During the Live Broadcast, I Proposed to a Female Spirit - And She Said Yes?!
I Proposed to a Ghost Girl During the Livestreaming - And She Actually Agree?!

altTitles.vi: Tôi Livestream Cầu Hôn Nữ Quỷ Vậy Mà Thành Công!?

description.en: For the sake of the show’s effect, Fang Ning invited a cheap drama crew to prepare for an overnight live broadcast at the Princess Tomb. However, unexpectedly, something happened midway through the live broadcast – Fang Ning mistook a female ghost for a cast actress and proposed to her directly! Now, what should he do if she takes it seriously?!

altTitles.ja: スリープレス・ビューティー

description.en:
'I wish I could share my sleepiness with you, Oz-san.'

Designer Kotou, who has trouble sleeping, secretly respects Amemiya, a junior employee in another department. He admires the way he can quickly turn down a drinking session he doesn't feel like attending, and the way he takes a nap in exactly 15 minutes during his lunch break. Kotou, who has a tendency to overthink things and is unable to get along with others in a safe manner, looks at him with envy.

On his way home one day, Amemiya invites him out for a drink, and with the help of alcohol, Kotou spills the beans about his insomnia problems. Afterwards, he decides to let the drunken Amemiya stay at his house. There, Amemiya proposes "sleeping in a sofa" as a solution to his insomnia - and what happens?

altTitles.en: Amano Megumi is Full of Gaps!
Amano Megumi is FULL of Openings!

altTitles.th: เรื่องหนักอกของอามาโนะ เมกุมิ!

altTitles.ja: 天野めぐみはスキだらけ!

description.en: Shindo Manabu is a student at a very prestigious high school whose goal is to get into Tokyo University. He studies constantly and tries to never lose sight of that goal. That is until his childhood friend, Amano Megumi, who goes to the same school starts to distract him. He originally only remembered her as the tomboy she was as a kid, until he notices how "developed" she has become. As these two get closer to each other, hilarity often ensues and subsequently, Manabu becomes more and more distracted from his goal of getting into Tokyo U.
description.ja: 剣道に打ち込む体育会系ぷに子・めぐみと、東大志望のひょろ長男子・学──幼なじみの二人は中学で疎遠になるも、同じ高校に進学して再び距離を縮めはじめた。プラスとマイナス、N極とS極──真逆な二人は引かれ合う…？
description.pt-br: Shindo Manabu é um estudante de uma escola de ensino médio muito prestigiada cujo objetivo é entrar na Universidade de Tóquio. Ele estuda constantemente e tenta nunca perder de vista este objetivo. Isso até que sua amiga de infância, Amano Megumi, que frequenta a mesma escola, começa a distraí-lo. Ele originalmente só se lembrava dela como a moleca que ela era quando criança, até perceber o quão “desenvolvida” ela se tornou. À medida que esses dois se aproximam, a hilaridade geralmente acontece e, posteriormente, Manabu se torna cada vez mais distraído de seu objetivo de entrar na Universidade de Tóquio.

title.en: Konna ni Kawaii Otose-kun ga Onna no Ko no Hazu ga nai

altTitles.ja: こんなにカワイイ音瀬くんが女の子のはずがない

altTitles.en: This Cute Otose-kun Can’t Possibly Be a Girl

description.en: Otose-kun, a male college student, loves being "cute" while crossdressing! But one day, his classmate Tachibana (♂) finds out about his hobby. What does Tachibana want in exchange for keeping the secret? They connect with each other through "cuteness" ♪
description.ja: 男子大学生、音瀬くんは〝カワイイ自分〟が大好き！でもある時、同級生の橘(♂)に、女装の趣味がバレちゃった…!?秘密をバラさない代わりに橘が音瀬くんに突きつけた条件とは??〝カワイイ〟でツナがる♪

description.en: Souji Enishiro, 15 years old (high school dropout), is a controversial streamer, "Aoringo," who makes a ton of money through his violent and outrageous video content. Although he is seen as a troublemaker, in reality, he is a kind older brother who loves his younger sister and sweets. Even his controversial videos are just a means to cover the huge medical expenses for his sickly younger sister. No matter if everyone in the world hates him, he is happy as long as his sister is doing well. That is until something happens to his beloved sister...

Based on a wealth of research, the book examines the life of Mao Zedong, the bright star who laid the foundation of today's China. The young Mao Zedong, who carried the banner of revolution through an era of upheaval, is depicted with images of unusual power with distinctive penmanship from Fujiko A, better known for his work in boys comics.

altTitles.th: สามรั่วตัวแสบ

description.en: The somewhat precocious and sadistic girl Mitsuba, the somewhat lecherous muscle girl Futaba, and the somewhat mysterious gloomy girl Hitoha. Better known as the (mischievous) "Marui Sisters," this is the story of how these triplets go about their days in Class 6-3 with their cute yet wild antics.

title.en: Namae no nai Kaibutsu - Kumo to Shoujo to Ryoki Satsujin

altTitles.en: The Nameless Monster - The Spider, the Girl, and the Grotesque Murders

altTitles.ja: 名前のない怪物 蜘蛛と少女と猟奇殺人

description.en:
Midnight. Awakened by the echoing sound in my room, I was met with a frightening pair of "legs." Since then, as if wishing to merely make its presence known, it remained in my room without letting itself be seen. In the same way it was spreading its encircling net, little by little it encroached on my life until at last it appeared before me. Its true form was that of an exceedingly beautiful "nameless monster." Desperate resistance was futile as the monster dropped its hand towards me. I could not escape or resist. Hiding it from my skeptical lover and friends, thus opened the curtain to our strange life together. Quietly, the senses I had as a human were dying as my normal life continued to collapse. The moment I knew what was awaiting me, I was presented with an important decision.  
  
At the same time the monster first appeared before me, the public was disturbed by a string of bizarre murders. It was then that I began to wonder whether they and my beautiful yet eerie roommate were connected.
description.ru:
Полночь. Проснувшись от эха в моей комнате, я узрел пугающую пару «ног». С тех пор, словно желая просто заявить о своём присутствии, их обладатель остался в моей комнате, не давая себя увидеть. В тоже время он оплетал своей паутиной мой дом, понемногу вторгаясь в мою жизнь, пока, наконец, не появился передо мной. Его истинным обличьем оказался чрезвычайно красивый «безымянный монстр». Я не мог ни убежать, ни сопротивляться, когда монстр схватил меня. Скрывая это от моих скептически настроенных любимой и друзей, открываю занавес нашей странной совместной жизни. Когда я узнал, что меня ждет, я принял большое решение.  
С тех пор, как монстр впервые показался мне, общественность была обеспокоена чередой странных убийств. И я начал задаваться вопросом, могли они быть связаны с моим красивым, но жутким соседом по комнате.
description.pt-br:
Meia-noite. Acordado pelo som ecoando no meu quarto, fui recebido com um assustador par de "pernas". Desde então, como se quisesse apenas dar a conhecer a sua presença, ficou no meu quarto sem se deixar ver. Da mesma forma que estendia sua rede envolvente, pouco a pouco invadiu minha vida até que finalmente apareceu diante de mim. Sua verdadeira forma era a de um "monstro sem nome" extremamente belo. A resistência desesperada foi inútil quando o monstro baixou a mão em minha direção. Eu não podia escapar ou resistir. Escondendo isso de meu amante cético e amigos, assim abriu a cortina para nossa estranha vida juntos. Silenciosamente, os sentidos que eu tinha como humano estavam morrendo enquanto minha vida normal continuava a desmoronar. No momento em que soube o que me esperava, fui presenteado com uma decisão importante.

Ao mesmo tempo em que o monstro apareceu pela primeira vez diante de mim, o público foi perturbado por uma série de assassinatos bizarros. Foi então que comecei a me perguntar se eles e minha linda e misteriosa colega de quarto estavam conectados.

description.en:
“If there existed a tainted being among the hwarangs, who would it be? Of course, it’d be Seol Yeong-rang who uses sorcery to call upon spirits!”

Hwarang Seol Yeong, who was named as the tainted person who’d bring forth a great disaster one day.

There was only one way to get rid of the false accusations and return to his rightful position.

It was to prove he wasn’t tainted by evil spirits by solving abnormal incidents.

Then, Zaha, the governor of the previous generation’s hwarang, the man who killed a Great Chaotic God eight years back and disappeared without a trace, appeared in front of Seol Yeong…
description.fr:
« S’il existait un horrible fantôme parmi les Hwarangs, qui serait-il ? Bien sûr, ce serait Seol Yeong qui utilise la nécromancie pour invoquer les fantômes ! »

Hwarang Seol Yeong, qui avait été désigné comme l’horrible fantôme qui provoquerait un jour un grand désastre.

Il n’y avait qu’un seul moyen de se débarrasser de ces fausses accusations et de retrouver sa position initiale.

Il devait prouver qu’il n’était pas un horrible fantôme en résolvant des incidents anormaux.

C’est alors que Ja Ha, le chef du Hwarang de la génération précédente, l’homme qui a tué un grand esprit maléfique huit ans auparavant et qui a disparu sans laisser de traces, apparaît devant Seol Yeong…

description.en: The manga will focus on the character Koharu Hidaka, who is a middle school teacher close to 30 years old in 2007.
description.es-la: Año 2007, Hidaka Koharu ahora es maestra de secundaria y a punto de alcanzar los 30 años. Sin novio y sin perspectivas para el futuro. Balanceándose entre el trabajo y la búsqueda de matrimonio, el corazón de esta chica madura es como un Kikouken.

description.en:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.uk: Мільйони років минуло з часів легенд, коли світ людей і богів був єдиним. У ті часи бажання людини верховодило над світом. Це була епоха 500-річної війни, період ворожих держав. «Королівство» — історія про хлопчину на ім’я Сінь, котрий прагне стати найвеличнішим генералом та про безліч випробувань та скитань, повз які пролягатиме його шлях до мети.
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

title.en: I Rely on My Harem to Conquer the World

description.en: Young Li Haoran tragically died after being ruthlessly betrayed by his teammates in a battle against demonic beasts. However, when he opens his eyes again, he finds himself reborn as the Blood Demon King in a tribe full of succubi. On top of that, he has acquired a special system that allows him to grow stronger simply by building a harem. This time, he will seize the opportunity, forge himself into a true demon, and lead his harem to conquer the world!

title.en: Jinmyaku Cheat de Hajimeru Hitomakase Eiyuu-tan

altTitles.ja: 人脈チートで始める人任せ英雄譚

altTitles.en: A Heroic Tale About Starting With a [Personal Relations] Cheat Ability and Letting Others Do the Job

description.en:
Ned is a young man who has been behind many of the world's greatest achievements, wielding a weapon known as "human networking". One day, however, he is judged by the selfish king to be a liability and expelled from the heroes' party. Ned decides to start from scratch as an adventurer. However, his life as an adventurer is naturally far from ordinary, as he is adored and connected with everyone, from the leader of the knights to the princess of the mermaid tribe...

"Can I get help from the Wisdom King and the Great Sage to find this person?"

Meanwhile, the king is coming to a realization: the heroes' party was full of capable, but incredibly problematic children, and that it was Ned that kept them reined in...
description.ja: 人脈を武器とし、著名な冒険者パーティ『星屑の灯火団』の一員として、活躍を繰り広げてきたネット＝ワークインター。だがインテール王国が『星屑の灯火団』を勇者パーティに任じるにあたり、国王の身勝手な理屈でネットはパーティから追放されてしまう。仕方なくネットはまた一から冒険者としての旅を始めるのだが……。

altTitles.ja: ゲーセン少女と異文化交流

altTitles.ja-ro: Game Center Shoujo to Ibunka Kouryuu

altTitles.ja: Cultural Exchange With Game Center Girl

altTitles.en: Cultural Exchange With A Game Center Girl
Cross-Cultural Exchange With the Girl at the Arcade

altTitles.zh: 与游戏中心的少女异文化交流的故事

altTitles.zh-hk: 與遊戲中心的少女異文化交流的故事

description.en: A Japanese arcade worker meets a young girl from England and strikes up a friend(?)ship.

title.en: Josou Danshi wa Skirt wo Nugitai!

altTitles.ja: 女装男子はスカートを脱ぎたい！

altTitles.en: The Crossdressing Boy Wants to Take Off His Skirt

description.en: Uichiro, a junior high school boy, harbors a secret he cannot share with his childhood friend, Tama-chan. He has been cross-dressing for her because she has a phobia of men. This is a thrilling yet agonizing comedy about a boy who cross-dresses for the girl he loves!
description.ja:
男子中学生の宇一郎には、幼馴染のたまちゃんに言えないある秘密があった。
それは男性恐怖症である彼女のために「女の子を演じている」ということ。
想いを寄せる少女のために女装を続ける年頃男子のドキドキ悶絶コメディ！！

altTitles.ru: Игра семьи Обу - Семейная история войны

altTitles.ja: ゲーム オブ ファミリア ―家族戦記―
ゲーム　オブ　ファミリア-家族戦記-

description.en:
High schooler Sasae Hatsushima has been summoned to a world of dark fantasy to defeat an undead army. That shouldn’t be hard when he has the help of his hyper-competent stepmom and her two younger daughters, a high school karate champion and a girl genius!

But to gain the powers needed for their quest, a great and painful price must be paid… And who better to pay it than Sasae, who seems utterly ordinary compared to his brilliant stepfamily?

title.ja: Isekai Kaeri no Daikenja-sama wa Sore Demo Kossori Kurashite Iru Tsumori desu

altTitles.ja: 異世界帰りの大賢者様はそれでもこっそり暮らしているつもりです

altTitles.en: The Great Sage Who Returned from Another World Wants to Live Quietly

description.en: Saito was reincarnated to the other world at the age of 15, becomes the Great Sage, and defeated the Demon Lord. Shortly after that, the door connecting the other world and the real world opens, and Saitou return to Japan with the power of the Great Sage. However, 19 years have passed in the real world. Saito, who was drifted away for so long, met his childhood friend Kanako, who's now a single mother. But it seems like there’s someone who’s targeting Kanako's life...
description.ja: 15歳で異世界へ転生したサイトーは 大賢者となって魔王を余裕で討伐！ 異世界と現実世界を繋ぐ扉をくぐり帰還するも 日本では19年の歳月が過ぎていて‥‥。 ウラシマ状態のサイトーが出会ったのは シングルマザーとなった幼馴染のかなこ。 なにやら、かなこの命を狙う輩がいるらしい！

description.en: Taro Sakamoto was the ultimate assassin, feared by villains and admired by hitmen. But one day…he fell in love! Retirement, marriage, fatherhood and then… Sakamoto gained weight! The chubby guy who runs the neighborhood store is actually a former legendary hitman! Can he protect his family from danger? Get ready to experience a new kind of action comedy series!
description.fr:
Taro Sakamoto est un assassin légendaire, le meilleur d'entre tous, craint par tous les gangsters, adulé par ses pairs. Mais un beau jour... il tombe amoureux ! S'ensuivent retraite, mariage, paternité... et prise de poids.
Sakamoto est aujourd'hui patron d'une petite épicerie de quartier et coule des jours heureux avec sa famille. Mais lorsque son passé le rattrape sous les traits de Shin, un jeune assassin télépathe, Sakamoto reprend du service...
Et malgré son apparence, il est toujours aussi charismatique lorsqu'il passe à l'action !
description.ja: 町の商店を営むふくよかな男・坂本太郎。その正体は全ての悪党が恐れ、憧れた元・伝説の殺し屋!!　襲い来る危険から家族と日常を守る、坂本の日々とは…!?
description.ru: Таро Сакамото был профессиональным киллером. Другие наёмники им восхищались, а злодеи боялись. Но однажды… Сакамото влюбился! Завязал с криминалом, женился, стал отцом и в итоге… Разжирел! Толстый дядька из соседнего магазина — в прошлом непревзойдённый убийца! Сможет ли он уберечь свою семью от опасности? Приготовьтесь к новой остросюжетной комедии!
description.pt-br: Taro Sakamoto era o assassino supremo, temido pelos vilões e admirado pelos assassinos. Mas um dia... ele se apaixonou! Aposentadoria, casamento, paternidade e depois… Sakamoto engordou! O cara gordinho que administra a loja do bairro é na verdade um ex-assassino lendário! Ele pode proteger sua família do perigo? Prepare-se para experimentar um novo tipo de série de comédia de ação!

title.en: The Limits of High Specs Marriage: 13 Great Men in a Reality Love Show

altTitles.ja-ro: High Spec Kon ni mo Hodo ga Aru: 13-nin no Ijin-tachi to no Renai Reality Show

altTitles.ja: ハイスペ婚 ほどがある  13人の偉人たちとの恋愛リアリティーショー

description.en: The main character in “Highly Spiced Marriage: Love Reality Show with 13 Greats” is Nao Anegawa, the eldest daughter of a mother-son family who loves her younger siblings who are in the prime of life. On her way home from shopping, she is whisked away to the heavenly realm and forced to appear on “Love Key Man,” a romantic reality show for the gods who have nothing better to do in their spare time. For every one of her male partners, 13 men are gathered from various eras, including Hijikata Toshizo, Friedrich II, Prince Shotoku, Alfred Nobel, and Urahara no Narihira. The ultimate love game with these great men who have left their mark on history begins.

altTitles.vi: Thiên đường song song tại dị giới

description.en: One day at school, Youta sees someone strange entering his school. Out of nowhere this being appears next to him and makes him fall from the 3rd floor. He lands in a strange world, where beings like dragons exist! Youta meets a young paladin, and discovers that he is the only man inhabiting that planet, and that its inhabitants are extremely 'weak' to his presence. Could this be paradise?
description.ja: 異世界に迷い込んだ男子高生・太多陽太は、森の中で美少女騎士・ルーミと出会う。そこは少女だけが存在する世界。神の化身からルーミとの交尾を命じられる陽太。触れられただけで極限まで発情したルーミは‥‥!?
description.es-la: “Por favor, apareate conmigo”. En un mundo extraño, Youta Tada es atacado por una hermosa chica caballero en celo. Solamente monstruos temidos y chicas hermosas viven en este mundo.¡El único hombre es Youta Tada! ¿¡Es esto el cielo o el infierno para Youta!?
description.pt-br: Em um dia na escola Youta vê alguém estranho entrando na escola, do nada este ser aparece ao seu lado e o joga do 3º andar! Porém ele vai parar em um mundo estranho, onde seres parecidos com dragões existem! Youta conhece uma jovem paladina, e descobre que é o único homem habitando aquele planeta, e que suas habitantes são extremamente ‘fracas’ a sua presença… seria este o paraíso?!

description.en: After leaving a scar on his best friend's face years ago, Tsubaki feels responsible and is determined to grow up big and strong so he can protect Yuu. Yuu is already in high school and Tsubaki is only in elementary, but he is sure that his feelings will get through and Yuu will eventually come to rely on him.
